segments.text: I can clearly see the "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is delving deep inside, pulling out the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant gaze is fixed on him, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their mission, completely ignoring the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of children trying to outsmart the adults.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of nostalgia for such mischievous childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, just a few feet away, remains utterly unaware of their stealthy operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness allows their little scheme to progress unimpeded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's rather infuriating that she's missing so much right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are quite bold, staging their raid so openly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll be so happy once they get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a perfect snapshot of youthful rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR
